messages.title: SOUTHPORT CONSERVATIVE UNITY: WORKING FOR OUR TOWN TODAY!
messages.content: Conservative unity grows from strength to strength, not only on a National scale but also locally. I have worked hard with our MPs Cllr Brenda Porter. Many feel that Southport has been crying out for truly committed representatives, many will make Southport our home, no longer tolerate Brendas version of apathy... TIME FOR CHANGE!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tackling issues of crime within the community, including thefts, vandals, and antisocial behaviour.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: John Pugh MP, Iain Brodie Browne

issues.education: Meeting to discuss Southport Schools with Michael Gove MP Shadow Secretary of State for Children Schools and Families
issues.governance: The consequences of Labours 24 hr drinking policy is well documented
issues.health: Residents may therefore be very surprised that this assistant is still a trusted member of this MP’s staff.

housing.content: Derelict houses, Parking in Village, your views required

images.caption: Meeting to discuss Southport Schools with Michael Gove MP Shadow Secretary of State for Children Schools and Families

leaflet.additionalNotes: Concerns over the unhygienic bin system. Snowy conditions and un-gritted roads could have been something taken more seriously by our council in this issue.
